website_summaries.verdict: A set that provides a lot of cleaning options for a good price.
pros: Fights bacteria to get your laptop very clean
Includes wipes and sprays in the kit
Works well on phones and other devices
Wipes can clean more than 1 screen in a use
cons: The spray pumps are not terribly durable and sometimes they don't work well

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE ON MACBOOK WITH THE RETINA DISPLAY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT USE ON MACBOOKS WITH THE RETINA DISPLAY. It will strip the screen and make the screen look like you have air bubbles under your screen. The seller/manufacturer should warn consumers, but hasn't.
customer_reviews.author: AJ D.

customer_reviews.title: Hands down the best product on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best product on Amazon. I have a Samsung HD acrylic frame, 4k 27-inch iMac, iPhone 6 plus, MacBook Air, Ipad mini and regular Ipad. Tech Armor is the only thing I use to clean all my electronics. It is professional grade, not like the other stuff on amazon that claims to be all natural (Lies). This really cleans without the fear of damaging your devices, which, I'm paranoid. For the price, you get plenty of safe, clean, product.
customer_reviews.author: Abel

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT USE THIS ON A MACBOOK WITH RETINA DISPLAY—Left a filmy layer on my Macbook Pro Screen
customer_reviews.text: I just had my MBP's case replaced so my screen was looking brand new but for some fingerprint smudges. So I busted out my "trusty" tech armor spray and... now there is a disgusting, glaring almost impossible to remove filmy layer on my screen. I had to use a couple of paper towels (the 1st to wet and the second to try) to make it less glaring though I fear I may have scratched the screen in the process. As other users advised: DO NOT USE THIS ON A MACBOOK WITH RETINA DISPLAY
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Russell

customer_reviews.title: ... for Christmas and has been determined to keep it nice so she ordered this set
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old daughter got a laptop for Christmas and has been determined to keep it nice so she ordered this set. It is very nice and comes with more than expected. She has used the disinfecting wipes on the keyboard area and they cleaned it nicely (and disinfected). The spray cleaner for the screen worked well and didn't leave any streaks or marks. She loved that the cleaning cloth was leopard print - right up her alley! Like I said, the kit came with a lot of cleaning items for the price and I see it lasting her quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good coating for my phone.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to "fix" the oleophobic coating on my plastic lifetime warranty phone screen protector. Everytime they replace it they squeegee the coating off to try and curve it around my Samsung S10+. This works very well to clean the screen, keep it smudge resistant and smooth to the touch. If I use it 2vor 3 days in a row, it lasts longer. I tried this on my glasses and it made a mess that was hard to wipe off, however when I went outside into bad humidity they didn't fog up and seemed to be clearer. Not sure it was worth the effort, lens wipes are for glasses.
customer_reviews.author: MoonShadow

customer_reviews.title: Great kit full of useful items!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is great! The pre-moistened wipes are handy to use when visiting my granddaughter. We use them to clean her iPad. Keep some in my purse to use on my cellphone. The cloths are soft and work well with the gel on my computer screen. There was a slight problem with the spray coming out of the large bottle. Their customer service gave me a helpful suggestion which unfortunately did not solve the problem completely. Customer service contacted me and is sending a new large bottle. Great Customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Amy's Grammy

customer_reviews.title: Good Bang For Your Buck
customer_reviews.text: 10 dollars will allow you to have 2 cleaning solution bottles (one big and one small), portable wet wipes, and 2 microfiber cloths. I thought it was a good deal so I decided to buy it to wipe my phone and MacBook. The spray works really well with my MacBook and phone and left it streak free. I really enjoy this product because products in the past left streaks and some even left lint with their towels. This appeared to be the highest rated on I could find on Amazon so I decided to purchase it. I'm happy with my purchase and will purchase more when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hsiao

customer_reviews.title: Best screen cleaner I've found
customer_reviews.text: Really, really good screen cleaner. Bought this randomly based on reviews, primarily to clean the screens on a Macbook and a Macbook Pro. I've had problems getting them *perfectly* streak free with other cleaners, but this worked like a charm with just a few wipes. I didn't pay much attention to the package contents when I ordered, and was pleasantly surprised to see it came with both the 4oz and 2oz bottles, a big stack of one-use individually packaged wipes, a nice microfiber cloth, and another dual-sided ultrafine/microfiber cloth for glasses, phones, etc. Can't beat that at this price, should last me quite a long time.
customer_reviews.author: K.W.P.

customer_reviews.title: makes for clean screens, but will not give you the silky slick feel you want
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I've tried windex, other lens cleaning wipes, rubbing alcohol, but this cleans amazingly well with no wet residue or streaks. it cleans your screen well ( phone, laptop, TV) BUT I was hoping for something to really make the screen slick to the touch. I had stupidly used rubbing alcohol to clean my phone, which stripped away the oleophobic coating. Surface wasnt smooth and silky anymore. While this does add a *bit* of slick and silky coating, it sadly doesnt go far enough.
customer_reviews.author: Dmh529

customer_reviews.title: Great size for the classroom
customer_reviews.text: My high school students have been so happy to use the big bottle that I left out for them, by the pencil sharpener. It warms my heart to see them spraying away germs and keeping their school-issued Chromebooks and personal devices germ free. Hallelujah. I take the rags home each week to launder them. It’s lasting, too. Barely 1/4 used after 6 weeks (I have 180 students a day, but I don’t kid myself that they’re ALL using it). I keep the small bottle by me. Barely 1/16th used so far. Should be good til summer vaycay!
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Clean Screens
customer_reviews.text: This cleaning kit was just what I needed. Contained 2 cloths, 2 bottles of spray and disposable cleaning cloths. I went on a screen cleaning binge and it worked great on all my devices. No odor and easy to use. Chose this one over other products because of the Tech Armor name. Have always had good experiences with their products.
customer_reviews.author: VLA

customer_reviews.title: great buddy for your phones and laptops - get clean, get it now
customer_reviews.text: i bought this as a christmas gift for a friend and this is truly the gift that keeps on giving because his roommates, and i, and the gift recipient himself have used this multiple times! the travel sizes are perfect to keep at work and for prepping your equipment right before a meeting and everything. there's 2 microfiber cloths in there in varying sizes. the size and packaging and total value for this product are incredible. start cleaning your phones and laptops! PS - DO NOT USE THIS TO CLEAN YOUR KEYBOARD. they mention it on their guide as well but just in case you're the type to disregard that, here's another heads up
customer_reviews.author: pranatireddy

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item after noticing my laptop collects a lot of dust and other debris. I have young kids so it even attracts sticky fingerprints. It comes with quite a few disposable cleaning wipes I will use for my phone or a quick wipe down on my laptop after a couple days of use. I am very impressed with the spray and micro fiber clothes. Comes with a big cloth probably better suited for bigger monitors, but the smaller of the two fits my needs. Just after one use my laptop and phone looked new again! For the price I paid and the quality/quantity I received, I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sugarling

customer_reviews.title: Clean much better than just water.
customer_reviews.text: I first tried this when my daughter offered it to me to clean my iPad screen. It is terrific, which is why I bought some for myself. It seems to me that the screen stays clean longer than it does when I just clean it with water. I have a screen-protector on my iPad and this product produces a clean, slick surface that lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works really good (wipes are even better) without leaving any residue/smudge at all
customer_reviews.text: Works really good (wipes are even better) without leaving any residue/smudge at all. In the past the other lens/LCD screen protector were leaving lot of residue / smudge but not with this one. Especially included wipes are better than the gel based cleaning. So I would recommend to use wipes for TV screen cleaning as it works even better in not leaving any residue at all & that's important.
customer_reviews.author: P P M

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE FOR MACBOOK RETINA DISPLAY
customer_reviews.text: WARNING: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS PRODUCT IF YOU HAVE A MACBOOK! If I could give this 0 starts I would, this product COMPLETELY RUINED my macbook. The whole screen was stripped and is permanently ruined. Everything appears blurry on my screen and the camera is all fuzzy. I purchased this product because it stated that it could be used on ALL products. They should be warning customers before claiming it can clean ALL screens. Absolutely ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: jp

customer_reviews.title: The frame is a big help
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. The pice of plactic used to try to remove bubbles should be a lot lager.The frame is a very good featufre helps to aline the screen proctor. I still have a couple of small bubbles but I am 80 and not to handy so mostlikely my fault. This was much better the the first set I tried.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: but this stuff is awesome. Leaves touchscreen looking like new with amazing motion ...
customer_reviews.text: I rarely give anything 5 stars, but this stuff is awesome. Leaves touchscreen looking like new with amazing motion response to a gentle touch. Just spray some on and gently wipe off and you're off. Performs exactly as advertised with no cons. Amazon price is unbeatable. I use this on my smartphones, laptop and my daughter's Kindle Fire HD. My daughter gets everything on her Kindle like dripping popsicles and various other food items. They litterally gently wipe off without scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: finally a product that works!
customer_reviews.text: FINALLY a way to keep my uber large screen TV --- NO SMUDGES!! I have tried to clean my TV screen off since day one that I brought it home! I have used everything I could think of. But I finally took a "what the hell" type chance on this kit and it WORKED!!! My last resort, turned out to be perfect! I also like that it came with a nice packet of smaller screen wipes that do a great job on my iPad and computer screen!
customer_reviews.author: CMac -Amazon Addict!

customer_reviews.title: Use The Bottles Of Solution & The Cloths, Works Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the results but I just want to note that the wipes leave a residue but it's good to have them and that's what I've been using up until yesterday because the spray and microfiber cloth work wayyyyy better. Not to mention that it comes with both a travel sized bottle & microfiber cloth but also a standard size bottle of solution and a standard size microfiber cloth. I'll try to upload some picture at another time if I can.
customer_reviews.author: Darius Scott

customer_reviews.title: Finger prints be gone!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy I ordered this set. With grubby fingers always moving my TVs around on their wall mounts, it's unavoidable that fingerprints are left behind. This is the perfect product to help you rid those pesky finger marks from all of your (no doubt many) screens - be it TV, laptop, computer, cellphone. The disposable batch is a nice touch for a portable solution while I'm traveling. Good product, fair price - no doubt will reorder when I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M Wray

customer_reviews.title: Tech Armor removed all of the spots and streaks and the screen is like new! So glad I took a chance on ...
customer_reviews.text: The screen on my Macbook was a mess due to another screen cleaner I had tried to use. No matter what I tried, I couldn't get the residue or streaks off. I figured $10.00 was a small enough investment and decided to order the Tech Armor as a last-ditch effort before taking my laptop in for a new screen. Tech Armor removed all of the spots and streaks and the screen is like new! So glad I took a chance on this product!
customer_reviews.author: lissalle

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the price. My boyfriend and I noticed that our electronics were getting dirty and were not in the best condition just due to wear and tear of using the products frequently. The spray and wipes work really well on computers/mobile phones and really anything with a screen. I like that it comes with two wipes and a smaller spray bottle so I can bring it with me anywhere, usually in my purse
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Conn

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: There is a lot product provided the money (I.e. cleaner, wipes and travel wipes). Cleans my screens (iPad, iPhone and Kindle) as well as my glasses, quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy W. Cox

customer_reviews.title: The Cleaning Kit Cleans...
customer_reviews.text: For when you want clean electronics, but you're not sure what the best delivery-method is for the cleaning solution. Spray from a small bottle, or spray from a slightly larger bottle? Maybe use a grey cloth, or maybe blue. Perhaps little moist towelette packets float your boat. If there is a reason for all the variety, it went over my head. They all work well enough, and can be scattered around your home or office.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far
customer_reviews.text: I've used it only once on my iPad and iPhone and I am happy with the results. I like the ease of spraying the substance and using a cleaning rag to wipe it down. For me, this is much better, more effective, and surely easier than applying a film over my devices. The only minor complaint that I have is there are 2 different cleaning rags and I'm not sure which to use. I think they could have done a better job describing the purpose of each. But this is a minor complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Pete

customer_reviews.title: Wet Wipes Made My Screen Sticky
customer_reviews.text: I used the wet wipes once to clean the dust off my iPad and it left a strange, almost sticky residue that ruined my stylus. The spray and dry wipes work alright, but there are cheaper options
customer_reviews.author: Owlmaiden

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous and easy way to get crystal clear screens!
customer_reviews.text: I'm guilty of rarely cleaning the screen of my MacBook Pro w/ Retina Display, and when I do, I can never seem to find a good enough product. This made my MacBook look like it had just come out of the box, and did the same with my iPhone and 3DS. Just spritz it onto the cloth, wipe, and appreciate the fact that your screen is now crystal clear! I'm definitely going to be buying this product again in the future. Tech Armor has just made me a loyal customer!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: This was an AMAZING investment - it's silly because it's such a simple product but it comes with EXACTLY what you see and works great. I used it on my Mac and it looks like a brand new computer now. I love the fact that includes a large one and a small one, since I travel often. Buy, buy, buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic deal, works great
customer_reviews.text: Really great deal! You get so much for the price. I've had this kit for over a year, and it is still lasting. Cleans screens very well without leaving any streaks behind. I usually forget to bring the kit with me when I go back to college, so my laptop and phone screens get pretty gunked-up while I'm away; when I come back home, I'm able to get them really clean again with the screen cleaner and cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I received this product yesterday and cleaned our lap top screen, iPad touchscreen, t.v. screens and phone screens. They were clean, streak free and look great. So easy to use and it cleans really well.
customer_reviews.author: L. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning kit for price.
customer_reviews.text: I actually looked up how to make cleaner and then decided to look up on Amazon and this product is surely worth the price. I hate my messy phone screen and always like to keep my laptop screen clean too so this product is perfect to have on hand in your home and it even includes a travel bottle which is great for my purse.
customer_reviews.author: kathfay

customer_reviews.title: Pretty dope
customer_reviews.text: I dont usually right reviews but this a good product tbh, i bought this and another cleaning product for my mac and phone. My mac especially needed cleaning since it had smudges i couldnt wipe off. I used towlettes from another seller and they did the job but man this cleaning kit really gets the job done it was so easy to get the smudges off and made my mac and phone look like new I even used for my tv and worked wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Fernanbro

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It keeps both my iPhone and my case in perfect condition. I have an XS MAX and the glass in the back it is almost brand new when I apple the cleaning formula
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Not a good value
customer_reviews.text: It’s not big and not worth the money. This product will last about a month. There are bigger cleaners for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Best screen cleaner ever
customer_reviews.text: This screen cleaner is the best! I used it on my tv, my kindle my phone. All smudges and streams are gone! I've tried many cleaners - this one works!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for its value
customer_reviews.text: Came with tones of tools to clean the phone. The quality of microfiber towel that came with it is also pretty good. The solution seems good in cleaning dirt and residues off the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Shon C.

customer_reviews.title: The cleaning kit is absolutely amazing. The price is great
customer_reviews.text: The cleaning kit is absolutely amazing. The price is great, and its wonderfully packaged. Comes with two cleaning bottles, travel wipes, and two pieces of cloth. I just used it and the results are great. I used to buy the welkin cleaner but this is so much better and the price is great. If you are thinking about it, my advice is definitely get it!
customer_reviews.author: J Lanier

customer_reviews.title: Would still be a great kit at twice the price.
customer_reviews.text: A great mixed kit, especially for the price! I really like the second smaller bottle. I keep it in my car along with the included microfiber towel. The wipes are great for travel. The cleaning solution is one of the best I've used. Doesn't leave ANY streaks behind like so many others do.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at how well this solution works. I followed the instructions in the back of the box and this product works magic! I used this on my phone, my laptop, and my glasses and it made them look brand new. I was honestly shocked at how well this works. It's alcohol free and safe to use. Very satisfied. I'm not sure if I need to use the wipes included, but it's a nice addition for when you're 'on the go' I suppose. Good product, will recommend to other.
customer_reviews.author: L8rMr

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love!
customer_reviews.text: This product has made my screen so clean that I don't recognize my computer anymore! The cloth I used was still damp so I cleaned the keyboard, my phone and a camera, all with great results. All surfaces were left clean and slippery to the touch. I'm in love with Tech Armor pro Cleaning Kit!! I'd happily recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dayyana

customer_reviews.title: A Good product that does what it says.
customer_reviews.text: Okay I really stink at writing reviews. I bought this to clean my flat screen monitor and my husbands TV as well as my phone and tablet. It got the best rating and it works. Comes with two sets of cleaner and cloth as well as wipe packets,I keep one in my bag,and one for the house. It cleaned the flat screens and all my other screens very well and when I run out,I'll buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything but wipes are wotrh it
customer_reviews.text: I love the micro fiber cloths the work as described the spray even worked like a charm , even use it to soft clean my airpods, but the wipes ....yeah not so much. they leave streaks and does not leave a clean clear result on phone or tablet , but I will say the cloths alone where worth the price alone. Still recommend this
customer_reviews.author: D. West

customer_reviews.title: Easy way to clean all those pesky fingerprints/ oils / yucky stuff.
customer_reviews.text: As someone who doesn't enjoy cleaning as much as the next person this stuff makes me excited to pull it out and clean up all our electronics. Works great and does a better job than the typical stuff you find at the store. No smell of anything really and doesn't leave anything but a clean device. A definite rebuy for us.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: DUST BEGONE
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well, even on one TV that is a magnet for dust. Picture is much clearer -- and this is an old set -- also works well on PC monitor. I assume that the CLOTH SHOULD BE WASHED IN WARM WATER & MILD SOAP. Would be good to have that info in the package. I could do with a lot less small "wipes" -- seems a little pricey, but not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Dobe Lover

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this whole set, I keep a few to-go packets in my purse and coat pockets since they work like a charm on my phone and iTouch screens. The littler bottle and cloth stay in my bedside table and the big bottle and cloth are used for our TV. All 3 products work great and leave our tech surfaces streak free. I also use it on my laptop screen, it cleans the protective screen case of my iTouch as well with no ill effects.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney A

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great reliable product. Bought this second time after first one ran out. Easily last for usage of 2-3 years.
customer_reviews.author: M. Shah

customer_reviews.title: Works well, even on screen savers!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I just finished using this cleaner on our iPads and iPhones, and it works great. We were especially excited to learn that it works on phone screen savers!
customer_reviews.author: DBY

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! It comes with a medium sized blue microfiber cloth, a nice smaller cloth, a large and small spray bottle, and several packs of travel wipes. I used one of the travel Wipes for my phone and not only did it clean my phone but also 2 kindles, a tablet, and a watch face before running dry! This is a great product, high quality.
customer_reviews.author: CThrasher

customer_reviews.title: Great Products
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic products. I had an extremely dirty laptop and these products did the trick - my laptop look brand new: screen, keyboard, crevices, etc. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Butchergirl

customer_reviews.title: great product & value
customer_reviews.text: I had this product for over a year and use it on my 55" Samsung TV and my brand new MacBook Pro and works great with both! only need a small amount for the Mac.
customer_reviews.author: Raf

customer_reviews.title: Shiny and clean!
customer_reviews.text: I have only been using the spray for my laptop and TV, I haven't even opened the to-go pouch yet, but it was such a good deal! No more ugly fingerprints, dust , or rubbing marks from a cloth, this spray and microfiber will rid you of it all! This will last you for a long time , i'm planning on getting a few for holiday presents for the techies in my family!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Beyer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cleaning kit!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleaning kit! I bought one for myself and I gifted a kit for my brother. As a person who hate fingerprints on any kind of screen, I must say this is definitely long lasting and it definitely cleans all your electronics sufficiently. Don't forget to clean your cleaning cloths of course
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Balthazar

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: This kit has everything you need to clean any electronic devices in your house. I use this kit to clean my iPhone, Macbook Pro, tablet, TV, you name it. It does a wonderful job removing dust, stains and fingerprints. It is especially useful if you're getting ready to apply a new laptop skin or iPhone case and you want to make sure everything is clean prior to application. Definitely worth the price and I will probably be purchasing this again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Incredible
customer_reviews.text: It is wonderful! I looked up so many different ways to clean my Macbook Pro screen, none of which worked. Finally, I bought this and it is like a miracle. It cleans not just my laptop screen but also my tv, phone, and tablets screens. It is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Zeairah

customer_reviews.title: Great Solution. Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been the most successfull cleaning solution I've used with my electronics. I mainly got this to clean my monitors but I've since used it on my phone, iPad, and TV and it seems to do a really good job of cleaning up without leaving the streaky mess. I've also discovered the wipes work great for wiping down the grime from a keyboard which I didn't think I'd use when I bought this. Overall, great purchase for me!
customer_reviews.author: MattJL

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product! My monitors at the office look as ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! My monitors at the office look as clean as the day they came out of the box! There is an ample supply of solution provided and it is a good thing - Once your co-workers see how clean your monitors are you will be cleaning theirs too, lol. Shipping was fast as well. I will be ordering a few more for my peers so they won't use all of mine. :)
customer_reviews.author: wcfiremanscooby

customer_reviews.title: Great product that actually works!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product...the first one I have used that actually works! Your packaging, instructions and product is terrific
customer_reviews.author: Mge

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Really nice and lasts forever. Gets my electronics super clean quickly. I also love the travel wipes because it seems I never notice how dirty my stuff is until I've taken it out in public. I've paid way more for a crappy cleaner at the Apple store that doesn't come anywhere close to this. I will definitely order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

customer_reviews.title: Great overall package
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product ever since I start attending college. I trust this product and I like to keep my electronic appliances clean. This has served me quite well and would highly recommend this item !
customer_reviews.author: Shirlene Paul

customer_reviews.title: nice cleaning cloths & the two sizes are convenient
customer_reviews.text: Get more streaking than I'd hoped for, nice cleaning cloths & the two sizes are convenient. Ran out of my Monster cleaner & decided to try this, will go back to Monster.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Works so well I was shocked. My toddler's grubby finger prints didn't stand a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs T.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.text: cleaned up a laptop which was spackled with long time dried food bits on the screen, keys, and body. the cleaning solution went in between the keys with no issues after it evaporated off. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Picasso

customer_reviews.title: Had to put some good pressure to remove smudges which I don't like doing ...
customer_reviews.text: It didn't really clean my laptop. Had to put some good pressure to remove smudges which I don't like doing (fearful of damaging my screen). It does work eventually; I just feel like water would have the same affect.
customer_reviews.author: Janice B

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I so like cleaning my portable electronics with this other than alcohol. This product doesn't seem to wear out things like my cases and covers like pure alcohol. I will be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: Never without a book

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing! I kid you not
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! I kid you not, I cleaned the entire computer with it, screen, keyboard, trackpad, pack and outside. The computer looks like the day I bought it. I am in love. I will always recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Anders

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a streak-free laptop screen cleaner! Tech Armor's cleaning kit is our new go-to kit for keeping all of our organization's laptops clean. We give out the individual wipes to our field staff and use the bottles in our main office. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Support Service

customer_reviews.title: This is the best solution for dissolving the greasy dust that accumulates on electronic devices.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best solution I have found for dissolving the greasy dust that accumulates on electronic devices. It is so good I hate to say this is such a nice kit. When it has been used up and I am ready to replace it the price will most likely have gone up significantly.
customer_reviews.author: M on Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Cleaning Kit
customer_reviews.text: So far I have applied this to my MacBook Pro once and it really did clean up it up very nicely. My keyboard as well feels like new after wiping it down. Very satisfied with this product. Will be buying it again. Would recommend 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Fredy M.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I am a videographer and I somehow always manage to get little dust particles when filming. It is super handy to have a bottle and a cloth ready at all times! The little packets are also a big plus when it comes to quick cleaning!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Yang

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, love the fact that it provides to separate bottles which makes it completely handy; I leave one at home and the other one in my glove compartment so it’s always there when I need any extra cleaning. Loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Escalante

customer_reviews.title: It works well but the larger container in the pack ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well but the larger container in the pack was not spraying well, the sprayer seems to be broker. So I will have to use the small one and transfer the liquid in the large one to the small one when the liquid in the small one is finished.
customer_reviews.author: pittsburgher

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: This worked to clean my LCD TV which hasn't been cleaned in way too long because I couldn't find anything that worked well. This got the gunk off that had accumulated from such time. Plus, the microfiber cloth that is included with this kit is awesome for my other electronic devices!
customer_reviews.author: Adam B.

customer_reviews.title: love this product
customer_reviews.text: love this product. Does wonders. Cleaned up MacBook pro Retina display with it and the screen looks brand new again. Love how shiny it looks. Microfiber cloth is a legit microfiber that would not scratch your products. used it on my iPhone as well
customer_reviews.author: jazuela34

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need
customer_reviews.text: This pack covers everything I need for my electronics at work and at home. I also share the single-use wipes with my co-workers who have filthy computer monitors. Drives me bananas! They love cleaning up their screens, and it makes me happy too. :)
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle27

customer_reviews.title: Best one I've found.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. I had crap all over my screen. This made it look like a mirror. I wasn't aggressive at all when wiping and it completely wiped any junk off. Doesn't leave a residue.
customer_reviews.author: OnlyBuilt4CubanLinx

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just received today and its awesome. I have the Macbook 12inch Retina and it did not damage my screen thank goodness! It cleaned it very well. I will continue to use and see if any issues arise. If so, I'll be sure to update! I'm so happy I found an affordable option for tech cleaning. Hopefully it works out long term!
customer_reviews.author: G Force

customer_reviews.title: I like how this cleaning kit includes a full size bottle ...
customer_reviews.text: I like how this cleaning kit includes a full size bottle and a travel size bottle. Same with the microfiber clothes. The kit does its job well and fast. I'm not sure how long I can use it for but I definitely like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of cleaning supplies in packet. Wipes away easily and streak free
customer_reviews.author: Louisiana  purchase

customer_reviews.title: must Have
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my computer and phone, due to the fact that so many people use my laptop in my home, i like being able to keep it clean. For the price i was amazed at what the kit included and how well it worked. i am able to keep the bigger bottle at home, and the smaller one in my laptop bag and take it with me anywhere i go work, or school. its great. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Juanita

customer_reviews.title: Clean Great
customer_reviews.text: These products clean great, I have not used the wipes as of yet, but the spray and cloths are great, do not leave streaks or fuzzies behind. Seems to be pretty good at repelling dust as well. Having the smaller cloth included to travel with is great.
customer_reviews.author: Savanna

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It didn't seem to help with any scratches on my phone. So it appears to be an overpriced cleaning solution.
customer_reviews.author: T. Schuyler

customer_reviews.title: Sparkely Clear in Afghanistan
customer_reviews.text: Tech Armor Complete Cleaning Kit finally provided me with the cleaning solution for my computer, monitor and television in a very dusty workplace-Afghanistan. I could not get rid of the smears/streaks on my monitor but once I used Tech Armor on my monitor the smears/streaks disappeared and my other electronics were clear and clean.
customer_reviews.author: ERVIN J DENNIS JR

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff!!! Other products I have used would leave streaks or were dried up. This has worked great on our laptops, TV's, tablets & phones. No streaks and only have to use one spray for 2 laptops. The cloths work well also.
customer_reviews.author: mewrex

customer_reviews.title: Cleans wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: What can this clean off of a Nexus 7? Fingerprints, nutella, goldfish seasoning, snot, orange juice, orange juice not found for a couple days, dried cookie crumbs hardened to the screen by orange juice, frosting, unidentified remnants of other snacks of 4 year old twins. It works over and over again and comes with plenty of fluid, 2 large cloths, and moist cleaning wipes. It cleans a screen protector too.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Works well to clean my iPhone screen. Nice little travel bottle included too.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle G.

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic. I use very little (follow the instructions) on the provided cloth and clean my TV, laptop and phone screens. The Tech Armor formula leaves a clear film that makes keeping the screens clean easy. Several subsequent cleanings required only a dry microfiber cloth to wipe the screen. I'm quite happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Works wonders. I get a lot of crap on my computer so this made it look like new
customer_reviews.author: K.C. Pronto

customer_reviews.title: works as described
customer_reviews.text: This works as described. I like the little cloths that come with it and that it also includes those individually wrapped wipes for on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Go on...

customer_reviews.title: Cleans very well!!
customer_reviews.text: Needed this to keep my laptops screen free of finger or dust smudges. I also use it to clean my keyboard, the solution helps fight bacteria and it's anemia free. Works very well, especially with the microfiber towels. I have even used the product to clean my glass desk and it leaves it very shiny :-) . Its been a month and I still have two battle filled up all the way. Use on HP Spectre 360 2-in-1 touch screen laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Robot Guy

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Love that it has a small travel sized kit. I can keep that permanently with my other travel stuff and always have it handy. I had a year's worth of grime on my screen. It was pretty bad. The outline of all the keys off my keyboard cover could be clearly seen. Used this stuff to clean it twice... and the screens just like new.
customer_reviews.author: Latte1sugar

customer_reviews.title: Good solid product
customer_reviews.text: I've been using apple klear for years and this is just as good if not better. I love the included cloths.
customer_reviews.author: Real food matters

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Cleaner is easy to use, cleans very well and comes with travel packets. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: VERY IMPRESSED
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great !! Used it on my LCD PC screens cleared the smudges , provides protection. But what I am really impressed with is this. I have a dry erase board that I wrote on with a permanent marker and Tech Armor cleaned the permanent markings completely off. Not easily but it did the job/ Highly Recommend Very Impressed.
customer_reviews.author: DEXTER

customer_reviews.title: Ruined computer screen
customer_reviews.text: This product ruined my computer screen as it did with other consumers who also gave this product a 1-star review. Very disappointed that this wasn't disclosed in the description
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: Poor bottle construction
customer_reviews.text: One of the bottles stopped spraying after 2 uses. It will be a refill for the other if it holds up by I wanted two. Spray seems to work well
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, great customer support
customer_reviews.text: I received the product quickly and it seems to clean screens very well as advertised. The spray pump on the larger bottle was not working when I opened the package. Usually I would ignore this and work around the issue because it would be too much of a hassle to get a refund or replacement. However, the vendor sent me an email asking to let them know if I wasn't 100% happy with my purchase. I explained the issue in a reply and they sent me another package for free. Great customer support!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Great variety
customer_reviews.text: I like the variety offered in this set. It gives me a chance to try a few options and see which cleans best. A great set for cleaning all your electronics!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it really works in all kind of screens. My laptop is touchscreen so it's always dirty or has fingerprints on it... the first time i cleaned it with this product it just looked like new!!! easy to carry on your laptop case...
customer_reviews.author: VeritaG

customer_reviews.title: Let Your Inner Clean Freak Flag Fly
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously the most comprehensive cleaning kit you will ever find. I used this to clean my phone before applying a screen protector, I use it on my laptop, I've even used it on a smudgy TV screen. This kit probably contains way more technology cleaning bits and bobs than any sane person would ever need, but for the price you can't beat this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

product_meta.title: Tech Armor 120 ML Pro Cleaning Kit Spray with ExtraMove Formula and Cleansing Wipes | For TV, Computer Monitor, Laptop, iPad, Smart Phone and Camera Screens | Removes Smudges, Dirt and Finger Prints
feature_bullets: Compatible Model(s): Tech Armor water-based TechClean gel formula is safe for ALL electronic devices including your mobile phone, laptop, computer monitor, TV, keyboard, gaming device or controller and much more!

WHAT ARE TECH ARMOR CLEANING KITS . Tech Armor Cleaning Kits Include TechClean Gel Screen Cleaner, microfiber screen cleaner polishing cloth and ammonia-free / no alcohol screen wipes. Keep your electronics cleaner with this complete cleaning kit.

HOW DO TECH ARMOR CLEANING KITS WORK . Tech Armor Cleaning Kits are a convenient way to keep your display clean and clear. Whether on the go or relaxing at home, our cleaning products offer unrivaled clarity and are 100 percent safe for all electronics.

WHY BUY TECH ARMOR CLEANING KITS . Tech Armor is THE trusted online resource for screen protection and mobile accessories. All our products are high quality at affordable prices so customers can enjoy their mobile devices in the best way possible.

Alcohol and ammonia free, our cleaning formula is safe for all high tech device screens (including LCD, LED, AMOLED, Retina and more). This cleaning solution works with all Tech Armor Screen Protectors. (PLEASE CONTINUE READING BELOW)
